verses.roman:
mukhe, gaṇḍe, nāke kṣata ha-ila apāra
bhāvāveśe nā jānena prabhu, paḍe rakta-dhāra

synonyms: mukhe—on the mouth; gaṇḍe—on the cheeks; nāke—on the nose; kṣata—injuries; ha-ila—there were; apāra—many; bhāva-āveśe—in ecstatic emotion; nā jānena—could not understand; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; paḍe—oozes out; rakta-dhāra—a flow of blood.
translation: Blood oozed from the many injuries on His mouth, nose and cheeks, but due to His ecstatic emotions, the Lord did not know it.
